001package net.tvburger.jdl.model.training.regimes;
002
003import net.tvburger.jdl.common.patterns.StaticUtility;
004
005@StaticUtility
006public final class Regimes {
007
008    private Regimes() {
009    }
010
011    public static BatchRegime batch() {
012        return new BatchRegime();
013    }
014
015    public static MiniBatchRegime miniBatch(int batchSize) {
016        return new MiniBatchRegime(batchSize);
017    }
018
019    public static OnlineRegime online() {
020        return new OnlineRegime();
021    }
022
023    public static ChainedRegime.Builder epochs(int epochs) {
024        return new ChainedRegime.Builder().epochs(epochs);
025    }
026
027    public static ChainedRegime.Builder reportObjective() {
028        return new ChainedRegime.Builder().reportObjective();
029    }
030
031    public static ChainedRegime.Builder dumpNodes() {
032        return new ChainedRegime.Builder().dumpNodes();
033    }
034
035    public static ChainedRegime.Builder dumpNodes(boolean firstTime) {
036        return new ChainedRegime.Builder().dumpNodes(firstTime);
037    }
038
039    public final ChainedRegime.Builder dumpNodes(boolean firstTime, boolean includeInputs) {
040        return new ChainedRegime.Builder().dumpNodes(firstTime, includeInputs);
041    }
042
043}
